name: Platform Projectiles
description:
Platform Projectiles sees the cube-shaped player, Qube, in the middle of a platform, with different sized white projectiles coming at them from all around. The smallest projectiles move fastest, and the largest projectiles move slowest. Qube must avoid being blinked out of existence by the oncoming onslaught, by dodging and employing the power of their own yellow projectiles.

Controls:

W/ Up Arrow - Up

A/ Left Arrow - Left

S/ Down Arrow - Down

D/ Right Arrow - Right

Spacebar - Shoot

How to Play:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around the platform and avoid projectiles, but don’t fall off! Press the spacebar to shoot your own projectiles and destroy enemy projectiles.
